Load the moderndive library, and load the `early_january_weather` dataset.

```{r}
library(moderndive)

data("early_january_weather")
```

Next, describe the `early_january_weather` dataset using the following variables:
* the variables in this dataset, including names / values of important variables
* the size of the dataset (using nrow and ncol)
* the mean temperature

```{r}
early_january_weather

nrow(early_january_weather)

ncol(early_january_weather)



```

The `early_january_weather` dataset is a 358 row x 15 row tibble dataset.
